array.string: How do I get my arms to be 18 inches.
How do I lose my belly in 12 weeks.
What kinds of exercises are good to develop nice legs.
Do workouts like Barbell Arms. The major exercises for developing triceps and biceps is there.
Getting in 20-30 minutes of cardio before resistance exercises can help maintain and lose weight.
Squats, Deadlifts and lunges are great exercising for strengthening muscles in the quadriceps, halmstrings and glutes.
